sentences: Digital Waffle is working in partnership with a truly exciting and innovative technology organisation
This is a fantastic opportunity for a dynamic, self-motivated and proven Software Engineer
You will work with a wide range of delivery squads and engineering teams around the business to provide them with the support, tooling and knowledge to achieve great results
To be successful in this role you
must have experience in the following:
Monitoring and Logging tools and frameworks (e
Prometheus and Grafana for metrics, Fluentd, Elasticsearch and Kibana for logs)
Databases (Most of our services access MySQL databases via JPA and Hibernate)
Cloudfront, Route 53, RDS, DynamoDB, Lambda, API Gateway, EKS, EC2, IAM)
And much more! Enquire to find out more!
